testcase.name: Check that the main elements on Google Homepage are displayed
testcase.system-out: Given I launch Chrome browser...............................................passed When I open "http://www.google.com" Homepage................................passed Then I verify that the page displays search text box........................passed And the page displays Google Search Button..................................passed And the page displays I'm Feeling Lucky button..............................passed And I close the browser.....................................................passed
